submissionWindows_note.message: Note: Enter Filesonic link(s) with www in front of filesonic.com

generatedlink_first_line_note.message: Do not close this window until your download links are generated.

generatedlink_second_line_note.message: If the links are not generated, try again!

background_notloggedin.message: Note: You are not currently logged in to Debridmax. Please login before using the tool.

background_verify_message.message:
Possible reasons: 
1. The link and/or password is invalid.
2. The service is down.
3. The premium accounts are out of order.
4. Server is overloaded.

background_auto_login_error.message: Auto-login username or password is incorrect

content_warning_download_selected.message: Select the link(s) first, then click "Download"

content_supported_hosts.message: Only RS, MU, MV, HF, FS, FN, UL, FD, UD, and VBB are currently supported

manifest_description.message: Free download premium RS, MU, HF, FS, FN, DF, UL, VBB, and many others easily via DebridMax. FREE !!! Please rate and donate this extension to support Debridmax

option_autogenerate_note.message: Note: For example, if you find an MU link (i.e megaupload.com/?d=IQJBRGVL) and you click it, it will generate the download link instead of opening the MU page

option_autologin_premiumnote.message: To get the auto-login feature, please donate via Paypal by clicking here and send an email to viperfx07@gmail.com afterwards.
